import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux" import { createStructuredSelector } from "reselect" import selectCartItems from "../../redux/cart/selectors/cart-items.selector.js" import cartTotal from "../../redux/cart/selectors/cart-total.selector.js" import StripeCheckoutButton from "../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.jsx" import "./checkout.scss" import CheckOutItem from "../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.jsx"; const CheckOut = ({ cartItems, total }) => { console.log(cartItems) return (
CHECKOUT
{ cartItems.length ? cartItems.map(cartItem => ) : Your cart is empty }
TOTAL: ${total}
DISCLAIMER
*Please use the following test credit card for your payments, thank you!*
4242 4242 4242 4242 - Expires: 01/25 - CVV: 123
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: cartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckOut);
